item.title: Drones Now Rule the Battlefield in the Ukraine-Russia War
item.description: Drones have changed the war in Ukraine, with soldiers adapting off-the-shelf models and swarming the front lines.

item.title: Trump Turns Up Trade Pressure on China After Beijing Fails to Come Running
item.description: China is still cautiously trying to figure out what Trump wants. The president has threatened big tariffs in response to the inaction.

item.title: European Leaders Look for Allies to Secure Ukraine-Russia Peace Deal
item.description: European leaders met in London to formulate a plan to help end the war in Ukraine. But even potential peacekeepers face political and economic hurdles...

item.title: How Trump’s Canada Tariffs Could Impact Both the U.S. and Canada
item.description: President Trump’s plan to apply 25 percent tariffs on Canadian exports is set to start on Tuesday. They would deal a brutal blow to Canada’s economy.

item.title: Released From Hamas Captivity, a Hostage Finds His Family Gone
item.description: Eli Sharabi gave himself up on Oct. 7, 2023, hoping to save his wife and daughters. After some 500 days in the tunnels of Gaza, he emerged to learn th...
